verbs.description: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump [V: has] held a " patriotism " event at the White House in lieu of a Super Bowl celebration for the NFL 's Philadelphia Eagles that he canceled .

[ARGM-LOC: WASHINGTON] — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: held] [ARG1: a " patriotism " event] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [ARGM-ADV: in lieu of a Super Bowl celebration for the NFL 's Philadelphia Eagles that he canceled] .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump has held a " patriotism " event at the White House in lieu of [ARG1: a Super Bowl celebration for the NFL 's Philadelphia Eagles] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: he] [V: canceled] .
